description: People like Chandrashekhar Azad inspire us to work for the nation: PM Modi We have got the chance to live for the nation. Let us contribute to nation building: PM The country progresses through Jan
caption: nm-4.com
message:
Thanks to all those people who joined the public meeting in Bhabra for launch of #YaadKaroKurbani.

We did not have the privilege of dying for India but we have a chance to live for India & work for India’s growth. http://nm-4.com/vd8t
